actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $2,400 a year the amount of outside earnings a beneficiary may have without the loss of benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases to $2,400 a year the amount of outside earnings a beneficiary may have without the loss of benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance). Increases the wives' and widows insurance benefits under title II of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $2,400 a year the amount of outside earnings a beneficiary may have without the loss of benefits.
